+        String testInstructions = """
+                If the button does not fit into the titled border bounds
+                and cover the bottom border's line then test fails.

+                .columns(35)
+                .splitUI(Test4247606::initializeTest)
+                .build()
+                .awaitAndCheck();
+    }
